attributes.action: Call for resignation of Kit Malthouse MP
attributes.additional_details: It is time for the immediate resignation of Kit Malthouse MP for his call to "dob your neighbours in".
attributes.background: The Policing Minister Kit Malthouse has called for individuals to snitch on their neighbours if they have a gathering of more than 6 in a family home. The Government must not to take this dangerous move towards a police state. This is an appalling state of affairs.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions which call for someone to be given, or to lose, their job. A petition cannot override an individual's right to due process.
